definitions.definition: A small room where confession —the Sacrament of Penance —is performed in private with a priest.
A filmed interview in which a cast member speaks directly into the camera commenting on the events of the episode.

main_definition: ( Roman Catholicism ) A small room where confession —the Sacrament of Penance —is performed in private with a priest.
secondary_definitions: ( reality television ) A filmed interview in which a cast member speaks directly into the camera commenting on the events of the episode.
